dmca.title: Re:      Unauthorized Use of World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc.'s
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, April 04, 2007 6:28 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3747428K] RE: Unauthorized Use of WWE Intellectual Property ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. RE: Unauthorized Use of WWE Intellectual Property Added by system at Wednesday, Apr 4 2007 10:19 am X-MailFrom: Stacy.Papachristos@wwecorp.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Apr 4 10:18:52 2007 Received: (qmail 18532 invoked by alias); 4 Apr 2007 15:18:52 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 18528 invoked from network); 4 Apr 2007 15:18:50 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 4 Apr 2007 15:18:50 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 4 Apr 2007 10:18:50 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 04 Apr 2007 10:18:50 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from Stacy.Papachristos@wwecorp.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HZ7G6-0002qo-5o for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 04 Apr 2007 10:18:50 -0500 Received: from mbxsvr2.wwecorp.com ([63.208.148.148]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from Stacy.Papachristos@wwecorp.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HZ7G4-000Jcp-5Y for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 04 Apr 2007 10:18:48 -0500 Received: from HQSTFMBX1.wwecorp.net ([10.10.1.121]) by mbxsvr2.wwecorp.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 4 Apr 2007 11:18:45 -0400 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5.7226.0 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message Return-Receipt-To: "Papachristos, Stacy" MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C776CC.891118AA" Subject: RE: Unauthorized Use of WWE Intellectual Property Date: Wed, 4 Apr 2007 11:18:44 -0400 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: RE: Unauthorized Use of WWE Intellectual Property Thread-Index: Acd2zIkTi8CFahJaTPW2fxmUpdqs8w== X-Priority: 1 Priority: Urgent Importance: high From: "Papachristos, Stacy" To: Cc: , X-OriginalArrivalTime: 04 Apr 2007 15:18:45.0439 (UTC) FILETIME=[896D34F0:01C776CC] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Stacy L. Papachristos Telephone: 203-353-5073 Fax: 203-353-0236 E-mail: Stacy.Papachristos@wwecorp.com April 4, 2007 Via Priority E-mail Re: Unauthorized Use of World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc.'s Intellectual Property Our File: WWE USA INF 994 To Whom It May Concern: World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc. ("WWE") is the exclusive owner of numerous trademarks, service marks, and copyrights. WWE, as the premier provider of wrestling entertainment services, has through extensive use and promotion of its intellectual property, established substantial and valuable good will in its intellectual property, and will not tolerate any infringement of the same. We have recently acquired evidence that you are infringing our trademarks, specifically by manufacturing, offering for sale, and/or selling counterfeit products (DVD's and VCD's) bearing WWE trademarks and/or talent images. Your use of WWE's intellectual property constitutes actionable trademark infringement, and counterfeiting. Moreover, your use of WWE's copyrighted works constitutes actionable copyright infringement. In the interest of resolving this matter amicably, we demand that you: 1. immediately and permanently cease manufacturing, distributing, advertising, offering for sale, and/or selling any counterfeit products bearing WWE trademarks and/or talent images; 2. agree not to manufacture, distribute, advertise, offer for sale, or sell any counterfeit WWE products, now or in the future; 3. immediately and permanently remove all infringing material from your www.medanshop.net website; 4. provide WWE, within 10 days hereof, with a report indicating separately for each product on it, the sales which you have made of products which bear any reproduction, copy, counterfeit or colorable imitation of WWE trademarks, service marks, and/or copyrights (quantity and price), together with your cost for each product. Copies of your records confirming your purchases and sales of such products should be enclosed with the report; 5. provide WWE, within 10 days hereof, with the name(s), and address(es) of your supplier(s) for each product, which bears any reproduction, copy, counterfeit or colorable imitation of WWE trademarks, service marks, and/or copyrights; 6. maintain continuing custody of all original books, records, or other documents reflecting your purchase, manufacture, offer for sale and sale of products bearing any reproduction, copy, counterfeit or colorable imitation of WWE trademarks, service marks, and/or copyrights and provide us with true and accurate copies of these records within 10 days hereof; 7. provide WWE, within 10 days hereof, with a detailed inventory of all products, promotional and other material in your possession, custody, or control bearing any reproduction, copy, counterfeit or colorable imitation of WWE trademarks, service marks, and/or copyrights, and any machinery, devices and material utilized to manufacture these products, or else surrender the same to us immediately; 8. provide WWE, within 10 days hereof, with a report detailing the names, addresses, and telephone numbers of all store jobbers, wholesalers, or other sellers or distributors to which you have sold such products which bear any reproduction, copy, counterfeit or colorable imitation of WWE trademarks, service marks, and/or copyrights; 9. provide WWE, within 10 days hereof, with a detailed accounting of your profits from the distribution of products bearing any reproduction, copy, counterfeit or colorable imitation of WWE trademarks and/or copyrighted images; 10. agree to pay WWE those profits and/or damages attributable to your use of simulations of WWE trademarks and/or copyrighted images, together with any attorneys' fees which WWE has sustained in connection with this matter; 11. confirm in writing that you have complied with all of WWE's demands by signing and returning a copy of the Acknowledgement and Agreement included below. The demands made herein are not made to the exclusion of other remedies to which WWE is entitled and WWE specifically reserves the right to seek all remedies available to it under law as a result of your infringing activities. In addition, by signing this document in the space provided below, you are agreeing to cooperate as set forth herein. If we do not hear from you by April 9, 2007, we shall be forced to take further legal action. Sincerely, Stacy L. Papachristos Associate Counsel - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ACKNOWLEDGMENT OF WORLD WRESTLING ENTERTAINMENT, INC.'S RIGHTS AND AGREEMENT TO CEASE INFRINGEMENT I, _______________________, agree to fully discontinue infringing use of World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc.'s trademarks and service marks, copyrighted works and trade dress, and agree not to make such infringing use in the future. I also hereby agree to comply immediately with the demands set forth above. I further agree that this Agreement shall be binding upon my respective controlled subsidiaries, affiliates, successors, and assigns. ___________________________________ Name: ___________________________________ Title: Date: _______________________ Sincerely, Stacy L. Papachristos Associate Counsel World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc Telephone: 203-353-5073 Facsimile: 203-353-0236 E-mail: stacy.papachristos@wwecorp.com CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This email has been sent by World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc.'s legal department. It is intended solely for the person(s) or organizations(s) named above (or their authorized representative) , and may contain information which is confidential and/or legally privileged. If you have received this email in error, please notify the sender immediately and destroy all copies of this transmission. The unauthorized use, copying, distribution, or disclosure of this email or any of its content is unauthorized and may be unlawful. Thank you. MIME element (text/html)

Stacy L. Papachristos

        &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;       Telephone: 203-353-5073

        &nbs p;           &nbs p;                                                                                                 Fax: 203-353-0236

        &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;       E-mail: Stacy.Papachristos@wwecorp.com

 

 

April 4, 2007

 

         ;    Via Priority E-mail  

 

Re:    &nb sp; Unauthorized Use of World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc.’s Intellectual Property

Our File: WWE USA INF 994 

                                      

To Whom It May Concern:

 

World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc. (“WWE”) is the exclusive owner of numerous trademarks, service marks, and copyrights.  WWE, as the premier provider of wrestling entertainment services, has through extensive use and promotion of its intellectual property, established substantial and valuable good will in its intellectual property, and will not tolerate any infringement of the same.

 

We have recently acquired evidence that you are infringing our trademarks, specifically by manufacturing, offering for sale, and/or selling counterfeit products (DVD’s and VCD’s) bearing WWE trademarks and/or talent images.  Your use of WWE’s intellectual property constitutes actionable trademark infringement, and counterfeiting. 

 

Moreover, your use of WWE’s copyrighted works constitutes actionable copyright infringement.

 

 

In the interest of resolving this matter amicably, we demand that you:

 

  

1.          &nbs p;        immediately and permanently cease manufacturing, distributing, advertising, offering for sale, and/or selling any counterfeit products bearing WWE trademarks and/or talent images;

 

2.          &nbs p;        agree not to manufacture, distribute, advertise, offer for sale, or sell any counterfeit WWE products, now or in the future;

 

3.          &nbs p;        immediately and permanently remove all infringing material from your www.medanshop.net website;

 

4.          &nbs p;        provide WWE, within 10 days hereof, with a report indicating separately for each product on it, the sales which you have made of products which bear any reproduction, copy, counterfeit or colorable imitation of WWE trademarks, service marks, and/or copyrights (quantity and price), together with your cost for each product.  Copies of your records confirming your purchases and sales of such products should be enclosed with the report;

 

5.          &nbs p;        provide WWE, within 10 days hereof, with the name(s), and   address(es) of your supplier(s) for each product, which bears any reproduction, copy, counterfeit or colorable imitation of WWE trademarks, service marks, and/or copyrights;

 

6.          &nbs p;        maintain continuing custody of all original books, records, or other documents reflecting your purchase, manufacture, offer for sale and sale of products bearing any reproduction, copy, counterfeit or colorable imitation of WWE trademarks, service marks, and/or copyrights and provide us with true and accurate copies of these records within 10 days hereof;

 

7.          &nbs p;        provide WWE, within 10 days hereof, with a detailed inventory of all products, promotional and other material in your possession, custody, or control bearing any reproduction, copy, counterfeit or colorable imitation of WWE trademarks, service marks, and/or copyrights, and any machinery, devices and material utilized to manufacture these products, or else surrender the same to us immediately;

 

8.          &nbs p;        provide WWE, within 10 days hereof, with a report detailing the names, addresses, and telephone numbers of all store jobbers, wholesalers, or other sellers or distributors to which you have sold such products which bear any reproduction, copy, counterfeit or colorable imitation of WWE trademarks, service marks, and/or copyrights;

 

9.          &nbs p;        provide WWE, within 10 days hereof, with a detailed accounting of your profits from the distribution of products bearing any reproduction, copy, counterfeit or colorable imitation of WWE trademarks and/or copyrighted images;

 

10.          &nbs p;    agree to pay WWE those profits and/or damages attributable to your use of simulations of WWE trademarks and/or copyrighted images, together with any attorneys’ fees which WWE has sustained in connection with this matter;

 

11.          &nbs p;    confirm in writing that you have complied with all of WWE’s demands by signing and returning a copy of the Acknowledgement and Agreement included below.

 

 

The demands made herein are not made to the exclusion of other remedies to which WWE is entitled and WWE specifically reserves the right to seek all remedies available to it under law as a result of your infringing activities.  In addition, by signing this document in the space provided below, you are agreeing to cooperate as set forth herein.

 

 

 

If we do not hear from you by April 9, 2007, we shall be forced to take further legal action.

 

          &nbs p;

         ;             ;             ;             ;             ;    Sincerely,

 

 

          &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p; Stacy L. Papachristos

          &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p; Associate Counsel

 

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

 

ACKNOWLEDGMENT OF WORLD WRESTLING ENTERTAINMENT, INC.’S RIGHTS

AND AGREEMENT TO CEASE INFRINGEMENT

 

 

I, _______________________, agree to fully discontinue infringing use of World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc.’s trademarks and service marks, copyrighted works and trade dress, and agree not to make such infringing use in the future. I also hereby agree to comply immediately with the demands set forth above.  I further agree that this Agreement shall be binding upon my respective controlled subsidiaries, affiliates, successors, and assigns.

  

___________________________________

Name:

         ;      

___________________________________

Title:

 

 

Date:  _______________________

 

 

 

 

 

Sincerely,

 

 

Stacy L. Papachristos

Associate Counsel

World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc

Telephone: 203-353-5073

Facsimile: 203-353-0236

E-mail: stacy.papachristos@wwecorp. com

 

CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE:

This email has been sent by World Wrestling Entertainment, Inc.'s legal department. It is intended solely for the person(s) or organizations(s) named above (or their authorized representative) , and may contain information which is confidential and/or legally privileged. If you have received this email in error, please notify the sender immediately and destroy all copies of this transmission. The unauthorized use, copying, distribution, or disclosure of this email or any of its content is unauthorized and may be unlawful. Thank you.
